message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product for $100. As you know, I have a 50% chance of selling high-quality products. I'll take the product. But I'm doing it because I'm the first one, and I don't have any information to go on yet. If I were in your shoes, I'd probably want to wait and see how the sales go.
